short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Hints for the NYT Connections game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of this project is to give users a seamless way to get help on the New York Times Connections Game. This chrome extension gives users a way to ask for hints as they solve the puzzle. After clicking the hint button for the first time, there will be a hint created that gives the user the title of the easiest category. After the first hint is given, if the user still cannot figure out the correct tiles, our program highlights a correct tile for the corresponding category.
